imdb.plot outline: Miss Lavinia reads your old fashioned letters from the days of yore. And gets a little steamy with it. An upstanding southern lady takes the lost art of handwritten letters and brings them to light by reading them to viewers on her back porch. The letters are not always what you'd expect. In fact, some of them are just downright naughty! Proof that people of the past shared the same desires and lusts we do today!
imdb.title: Letters from the Back Porch
akas: Letters from the Back Porch (United States)
